import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' const Products = () => { const [products, setProducts] = useState([]); const [categories, setCategories] = useState([]); // getProducts useEffect(() => { const getProducts = async () => { try { const response = await fetch('http://localhost:3001/products'); const data = await response.json(); console.log(data.data[0].categories) if (data.status == true) setProducts(data.data); return null; } catch (error) { console.log('Get products error: ', error.message); } } getProducts(); }, []); return ( < div className="container-fluid" >
